level.text: Application for certification as a security officer shall be made to the Mayor on a form prescribed by the Mayor.

Each person applying for certification shall submit to the Mayor, under oath, the information required by this chapter, as well as any other information that the Mayor may require for assistance in determining the applicant’s suitability for certification.
To be eligible to be certified as a security officer, an applicant, in addition to meeting the other requirements of this chapter, shall:
Be at least eighteen (18) years of age;
Either be a United States citizen or have in his or her possession a valid Immigration and Naturalization Service work permit; and
Be able to read, write, and speak the English language.
